original_title: Sri Lanka’s Ferentino Tyres unveils its latest range in Las Vegas
original_body_lines: Ferentino Tyres, Sri Lanka’s leading tyre manufacturer, successfully showcased its latest range of tyres at the prestigious SEMA (Specialty Equipment Market Association) Show 2024, held from November 5-8 at the Las Vegas Convention Center, USA.

Marking its second consecutive year at this flagship event, Ferentino impressed attendees with its commitment to quality, performance, and global standards, unveiling a range of tyres sized from 12″ to 19″. This new range, designed with precision for diverse driving conditions, is set to be available in the Sri Lankan market by early 2025.
The SEMA Show, a premier event in the automotive aftermarket industry, brought together over 7,000-member companies worldwide.

With recent certifications from prestigious global safety bodies, Ferentino Tyres has made successful strides into the U.S., Canada, and South America—some of the world’s largest tyre markets. Approvals from the U.S. Department of Transportation reinforced Ferentino’s dedication to top-tier safety and quality standards, strengthening its presence in these highly competitive regions.

Beyond North America, Ferentino Tyres earned esteemed certifications from Brazil’s National Institute of Metrology, Standardization, and Industrial Quality (INMETRO), as well as the Economic Commission for Europe (ECE) and the Gulf Cooperation Council Standardization Organization (GSO).
These achievements have positioned Ferentino as a formidable global competitor, equipped to serve markets across continents.

Lahiru Lokuwithana, Managing Director of Ferentino Tyre Corporation, remarked, “These certifications from globally recognized bodies strongly endorse Ferentino’s commitment to quality and safety. The introduction of our new range of tyres not only enhances the global appeal of our brand but also plays a crucial role in bringing much-needed foreign exchange to Sri Lanka during these challenging economic times.”
